root: ^`Anna wants to go to the park.`
^`The park is always quiet and beautiful.`
^`When Anna arrives, there are many people.`
^`Some people are sitting on benches and talking.`

p1: ^`She takes a book and reads it.`
^`After a while, a dog comes to her.`
^`The dog is friendly and wants to play.`
p2: ^`Anna sits on a bench nearby and watches the children.`
^`A little girl comes up to Anna.`
^`The girl asks for help with her shoe.`
^Tell the girl to ask her parents.
p3: ^`Anna throws a ball to the dog.`
^`Later, the dog's owner comes and thanks Anna.`
p4: ^`Anna ignores the dog and continues reading.`
^`Anna enjoys her book and eats her sandwich.`
p5: ^`Anna helps the little girl with her shoe.`
^`The girl's parents come over and thank Anna as well.`
p6: ^`Anna tells the girl to ask her parents.`
^`The girl runs back to her parents.`
^`After a while, she decides to do something else.`
p7: ^`Anna sits down to read her book.`
p8: ^`Anna decides to go for a walk in the park.`
^`Tom is also walking in the park.`
p9: ^`Anna takes a nap under the tree.`
^`She dreams that she flies like a bird.`
^`She wakes up feeling relaxed and happy.`
p10: ^`Anna feels happy and decides to do something else.`
p14: ^`Anna and the girl play a game.`
^`They play tag and have a lot of fun.`
^`After a while, the girl has to go.`
p15: ^`Tom waves back and walks over to her.`
^@tom Hi Anna, it's great to see you here!
p16: ^@anna Hi Tom, what a nice surprise!
p17: ^`@anna Hi Tom, do you come here often?`
p18: ^`@anna I like to come here to read and enjoy the fresh air.`
^`@tom That sounds nice. What book are you reading?`
p19: ^`@anna I like to watch the people.`
^`@tom Me too! It's fun to see everyone having a good time.`
^`@tom I also like watching the animals.`
^Do you have a favorite animal here?
^Do you like playing with the dogs here?
p20: ^`@tom Detective stories are great, they are full of surprises.`
p21: ^`@tom Adventure novels are so exciting! They take you to new places.`
p22: ^`@anna Do you have a favorite animal here?`
^`@tom I really like the squirrels. They're so cute!`
p23: ^`@anna Do you like playing with the dogs here?`
^`@tom Yes, I love dogs. Dogs always look so happy.`
^I played with a dog earlier today.
p25: ^`@anna What other kinds of books do you like?`
^`@tom I also read science fiction books.`
^`@tom Science fiction books make you think about the future.`
^Maybe we can read one together sometime?
^We should talk about our favorite books more often.
p28: ^`Anna and Tom continue to talk and laugh for a while.`
^`It's getting dark and it's time to go home.`
^`Anna says goodbye to Tom and goes home.`
p31: ^`@tom Yes, I come here sometimes to relax. What about you?`
^I like to watch the people here.
